name: Mario
description: The original and balanced racer. A great all-rounder among the medium-heavy class.

name: Luigi
description: The iconic brother known for his 'death stare.' A balanced medium-heavy racer.

name: Peach
description: It wouldn't be a Mario game without Princess Peach with her poofy pink dress and golden hair racing majestically through the tracks.

name: Toad
description: Protector of Mushroom Kingdom, Toad is taking charge behind the wheel for this one.

name: Yoshi
description: A Mario franchise stalwart and medium-weight racer. He's no novice to the Mario Kart tracks.

name: Bowser
description: The king of the Koopas, towering over any kart or bike he rides.
